text: Stephen D. Hogan (1948 â€“ May 13, 2018) was an American politician. He served as the Mayor of Aurora, Colorado from November 2011 until his death in May 2018. Hogan was a member of the Republican Party. He sat on the Colorado House of Representatives between 1975 and 1976. He was born in Lincoln, Nebraska. His mayoralty received international attention when twelve people were killed during the 2012 Aurora shooting. Hogan died of cancer on May 13, 2018 in Aurora at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Cancer deaths in Colorado Category:Politicians from Colorado Category:Politicians from Nebraska Category:People from Lincoln, Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Aurora, Colorado
title: Steve Hogan
